content: MCNLSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationSEAMLESS MULTIMEDIA SERVICE ANYTIME, ANYWHERE, AND ANY DEVICE! Welcome to Media Computing & Networking Lab. / Hybrid P2P Blockchain Team !We are aiming to research and develop innovative Computing & Networking technologies for Immersive Media Streaming services(including high-quality video, 3D game, 360 VR(Virtual Reality), AR(Augmented Reality), MR(Mixed Reality), XR(Extended Reality), Volumetric Video), and Blockchain/StableCoin/Web 3.0.For more details, please visit our research/interest menu.
